website_summaries.verdict: You don't need to pay $649 to own a vacuum that cleans at this level, and if you are paying that much, you deserve a machine with a better design than this.
pros: The Dyson DC41 Animal Complete cleans like you'd expect it to given the high price tag
The clever Tangle-free Turbine and its many other brush attachments give it an added layer of functionality for more-flexible housecleaning
cons: Dyson is renowned for its design, but maybe it shouldn't be -- this vacuum suffers from several baffling build oversights

customer_reviews.title: Excellent vacuum - purchased explicitly for use on carpet and ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent vacuum - purchased explicitly for use on carpet and pet hair. Works like a charm - very powerful. A bit heavy to my liking - but totally worth it. Easy assembly - and likewise to disassemble as well for emptying/cleaning. The cord is quite long so I don't have to move that around too much as I get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Kitke

customer_reviews.title: Shag Rugs?  Not this vacuum!!!! Worst Ever
customer_reviews.text: OK, owning this vacuum for 2 years, so this is an informed review. Pros: hardwood floors is good, maneuvers around furniture is great HOWEVER Cons: If you own shag rug, this vacuum is the WORST ever invented. The beaters have no adjustment and that makes pushing this vacuum over shag almost impossible. If you do, then after awhile a burning smell starts... it is the beater mini-motor overheating. Like I said, WORST ever, poor overall design, and finally dumping it so a better brand.
customer_reviews.author: Malcain

customer_reviews.title: BEST OF THE BEST
customer_reviews.text: I have had so many vacuum cleaners in my lifetime. Nothing compares to the Dyson. It has so much power that no dirt is left on the floor. I read reviews about it being heavy to use. I do not find it heavy at all. The maneuveralbiltiy is fantastic even on curved steps. Emptying it is a breeze with a release button that opens the bottom of the container for easy disposal. The filter is easily removed and cleaned. Dyson is the only vacuum I will ever use again. I very highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Horton

customer_reviews.title: We've had it over a year now and I love this vacuum
customer_reviews.text: 9 years ago I got my wife the DC-17 and after almost a decade and two vacuum turbine motors I finally decided to pick up the ball vac. We've had it over a year now and I love this vacuum. People on here complain the foot doesn't hold up the tower portion, and I think they need to read the instructions. I lightly push forward on the handle and it clicks, and I can pull it through a room with carpet without the wheels disengaging. The smaller footprint from the old DC-17 is also nice.
customer_reviews.author: M. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Expectations met.
customer_reviews.text: Likes: Suction power without lifting carpets. This is a very effective vacuum cleaner. I was astonished how much debris was collected on the first use. The ball junction really works well on carpet in aiding sweep direction. Easy to lift and move around. Quiet operation. Long chord. Dislikes: Heavy duty chord is stiff and difficult to work around since it does not want to lay straight. Ball junction does not seem to be effective on hard floors. Assembly directions need larger clearer depictions. Static electricity seems to hamper clean unloading. Seems the container should have an anti static finish.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Edward Wallis

customer_reviews.title: was the best model out there 9 years ago
customer_reviews.text: OMG - my old vacuum,which was a high end canister vac. from Kenmore, was the best model out there 9 years ago. I have had it serviced religiously, but clearly it was failing. The Dyson filled the canister with dust and dirt in seconds. It was ghastly, but now I am obsessed with using it everywhere. You literally see how well it works, because the dirt is in a clear container. It is amazing how well this works!
customer_reviews.author: Daisymiller4

customer_reviews.title: mostly easy to tear down
customer_reviews.text: Very strong, mostly easy to tear down. My long-haired cat who refuses to be brushed clogs it regularly, but he clogs the dishwasher, too (don't ask). The plastic doesn't seem like it'll last forever, but it seems to be holding up. Put your accessories in a safe place. Otherwise they'll just fall off and get lost.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: EVEN BETTER THAN MY OLD DYSON
customer_reviews.text: We had to replace an old vacuum at our vacation home so I brought my first Dyson (bought about 10 years ago) to the vacation home and bought this new one for our primary home. I didn't think any vacuum would beat my first Dyson, but the new one is outstanding. The first time I used it I had to empty the canister a couple of times...it pulled so much more dust and pet hair out of the carpets and transitions easily between carpet, tile, and hardwood without requiring an adjustment. The filter requires cleaning at least once a month, but considering how much it picks up, it makes sense and is worth the small inconvenience.
customer_reviews.author: Garden Spirit

customer_reviews.title: It broke after 6 months, Dyson said they would ...
customer_reviews.text: It broke after 6 months, Dyson said they would send us the part w2ithin 4-5 business days, 10 business days have gone buy, NO PART!!!!! Now, we have been waiting for the new vacuum they said they would send. Jan 13 we sent back the old one, were told new one would come within 5-7 business days. Today is Jan 26 and we were told yesterday 7-10 more business days. Amazon, take them off your list!!!!!~
customer_reviews.author: samantha stevens

customer_reviews.title: Powerful
customer_reviews.text: After 5 years it still doing is job. Great suction but poor maneuverability.
customer_reviews.author: PAOLA

customer_reviews.title: Suction on this vacuum is fantastic but Dyson needs to find a way to make ...
customer_reviews.text: Suction on this vacuum is fantastic but Dyson needs to find a way to make these vacuums pick up certain objects. Things like cat food or cereal that is on the floor Dyson will not pick up. Seems to me the vacuum is too close to the floor. Certain items just get pushed around.
customer_reviews.author: ellvell

customer_reviews.title: My wife has a large Dyson which she purchased about ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife has a large Dyson which she purchased about 5 years ago and loves it. One day she hinted that it would be easier on her if she had the DC65 for the upstairs bedrooms instead of lugging the larger Dyson upstairs every time she needed it. We found this one on Amazon and purchased it. Years later it's still going strong and she still loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Vince

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent machine. I purchased it on the advice of ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent machine. I purchased it on the advice of a trusted friend without having tried it. Certainly it is far better on carpets than my previous cannister and upright cleaners. I've yet to get accustomed to using the attachments; the hose and extender wand seem to have limited reach. Obviously I've yet to clean the filters, so don't know how that will work out. I miss not having a retractable cord. But these are minor concerns/complaints compared to what the Dyson has so far shown itself capable of. Check back with me in six months and I'll let you know how it's going during the heavier winter months of usage.
customer_reviews.author: Tim B.

customer_reviews.title: Best vacuum I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: We had the DC 40 model several years. When it finally died we purchased this DC65. WOW! What a difference. This thing is way more powerful. Anyone thinking of upgrading, this unit is well worth it. You won't believe the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Jim H.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: worked ok for about 3 months, then lost suction, makes excessive noise, followed all maintenance schedules
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its suction power is awesome! I had an older model Dyson before I purchased the DC65, which still works great. The only reason I bought DC65 was b/c I have a 2nd house. But, unlike the older model(I believe it's DC10), DC65's suction power is sooooo good! I have a cleaning lady who comes every other week, but now I like to vacuum my house b/c I love the suction power ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Yonsun Jung

customer_reviews.title: The best vacuum-cleaner I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: The best vacuum-cleaner I have ever had. By far!!! It is far better than my previous Dyson, which was already much better than any other vacuum I had that far. Well worth its price!!!
customer_reviews.author: DanRom624

customer_reviews.title: The power of the model is excellent. But the quality of it isn't there versus ...
customer_reviews.text: I have to say that the DC65 is a lot cheaper feeling verses the one that I bought several years ago. The power of the model is excellent. But the quality of it isn't there versus other models. But it work fine.
customer_reviews.author: griman

customer_reviews.title: satisfied
customer_reviews.text: So far, I am enjoying my dyson. It cleans well and is light weight. It was easy to assemble and it's easy to use. However, it took a while to be shipped, which I understand is because I am in Alaska. What I don't like is that I found the same item for $20 cheaper after it was shipped.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hyslop

customer_reviews.title: well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is amazing. No matter how clean I think my carpet is, I can run this machine and it picks up every single speck of dust there is. Lightweight, and the instructions on how to put it together can be confusing, but an awesome machine overall.
customer_reviews.author: The Banana

customer_reviews.title: I thought my other vacuum was fine..
customer_reviews.text: I thought my other vacuum was fine.....but then I used this and I was amazed by the amount of dirt it got up! AMAZING!
customer_reviews.author: danna

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: Now I know why people say these are the best. The real test will come 6 months to a year from now. My guess is it will work just as good. For now...Wow.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Malloy

customer_reviews.title: Love Dyson
customer_reviews.text: Lots of power..older Dyson seems to be more sturdy with the plastic and was easier to remove hose..still an awesome product
customer_reviews.author: LaLa

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great suction.. Only problem is the wheels collapse when you go to wheel it around.
customer_reviews.author: Doug B

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic vacuum. Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic vacuum. Lightweight, easy to maneuver, picks up so much more than my old vacuum, much quieter than my old vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: J9

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great buy!!!! Have found every escuses to vacuumed since I got it, I hope I don't ruin my rugs lol
customer_reviews.author: pharm718

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Recieved it yesterday. I was able to assemble without hubby having to assist. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Tania C.

customer_reviews.title: Not as Good as my Old Dyson
customer_reviews.text: Another Corporation that found a way to make their product cheaper and convince us they improved it. This vacuum does not compare to my old yellow Dyson. It feels flimsy and I doubt it will last. The handle does not want to go into the upright position....always takes at least 2 tries. When I finish vaccuming and want to roll it into the next room to put it away the handle keeps falling back. The dust bin is smaller and it's loud. I kept it because like my old Dyson it gobbles up everything in sight.
customer_reviews.author: MAX B ARMSTRONG

customer_reviews.title: Vacuum is great, so long as you don't need to use ...
customer_reviews.text: Vacuum is great, so long as you don't need to use the hose and attachments. The suction makes the hose stiff and unweildy. I use my old vacuum for fine cleaning in corners, between cushions, ect.
customer_reviews.author: David B.

customer_reviews.title: The best! Most powerful suction and cleans carpet and floors ...
customer_reviews.text: The best ! Most powerful suction and cleans carpet and floors in ONE pass.
customer_reviews.author: jimmy the bull

customer_reviews.title: Dyson DC65 Multi Floor Upright Vacuum Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: A lot of thought and engineering built in to this unit. Gets up the dirt other vacuums miss. Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.author: Angelo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent suction on honed travertine floors
customer_reviews.text: Excellent suction on honed travertine floors. Cleans dirt out of crevices with ease. Easy to use. Only negative ( but I find this with all uprights) the extension wand is short and awkward to use all in all fantastic product exceeds my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: MJ Payne

customer_reviews.title: Best vacuum ever
customer_reviews.text: Excellent vacuum. I didnt realize my house was this dirty until this vacuum picked up so much from my carpets that I thought were clean. ☆☆☆☆☆
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE.THIS.VACUUM!
customer_reviews.text: Dyson (heart eye emoji)!!!! The best vacuum on the market, let's be honest! I bought this vacuum because we are dealing with accidental fleas (agh!!!) and I wanted extra suction power! We already have a dyson (older "apartment"/mini model from probably 8 years ago) so I knew that these vacuums were great... But I needed an upgrade. Let me tell you, this vacuum will make you want to vacuum every day! It's magic!!! Worth every (hundred) dollar!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany SchlaeGuada

customer_reviews.title: Now will not suck up anything
customer_reviews.text: Worked fir one year and 3 months. Now will not suck up anything. Not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Ed and Betsy Robinson

customer_reviews.title: The suction on this vacuum is amazing. I couldn't believe how much my old vacuum ...
customer_reviews.text: The suction on this vacuum is amazing. I couldn't believe how much my old vacuum left behind. The Dyson really glides nicely and it is easy to maneuver around corners and under tables. Great product. Highly recommend it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum
customer_reviews.text: It's amazing. It effortlessly goes from carpet to hardwood. Nice long cord. Makes floors look as if they were just steam cleaned. Easy maneuverability, light weight and very quiet. Can tell difference in allergies with our family.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: It's the second Dyson we have purchased and it works ...
customer_reviews.text: It's the second Dyson we have purchased and it works well, as Dyson's do. It comes unassembled and the directions are fair for rebuilding the device. The cord length is adequate. It requires some finagling to get it to stand upright when parked. It's a perfectly adequate vacuum, but I probably could have found something similar for less $$$$.
customer_reviews.author: James Mctamaney

customer_reviews.title: Much heavier then I expected. Especially hard to push ...
customer_reviews.text: Much heavier then I expected. Especially hard to push on carpet due to the amount of suction. Picks up dog hair very well.
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: Great suction with great versatility
customer_reviews.text: We were pleasantly surprised by the suction and capabilities of the vacuum. At first we were getting a full canister out of each room. We have and will recommend this unit to others.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Leisen

customer_reviews.title: This vacuum cleaner sucks.
customer_reviews.text: I resisted the hype for a long long time before finally getting tired of replacing vacuum cleaners every two years. While this unit is relatively expensive (hence 4 stars), it does work as advertised. I will also add that while it does have a large amount of suction, it seems quieter than my other vacuums.
customer_reviews.author: James Ipock

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: Great performance, not too loud. First vacuum my dog doesn't like though, scared as heck of it. Also find the stiff hose difficult to use in tight areas, but then the hose is great for retracting back into place, so probably needs to be that way.
customer_reviews.author: Grant

customer_reviews.title: A piece of junk. We bought this two years ...
customer_reviews.text: A piece of junk. We bought this two years ago, believing all the hype in the ads. Well, it's already broken and our local, reputable vacuum cleaner dealer told us that its not even worth fixing.
customer_reviews.author: Trumbo123

customer_reviews.title: Dyson DC65 is nice. But comaperded to my DC07 that I use ...
customer_reviews.text: Dyson DC65 is nice. But comaperded to my DC07 that I use every weekend the plastic it's made from is much tougher/sturdier than the plastic that is used in the DC65.
customer_reviews.author: Will The Thrill

customer_reviews.title: We are pleased with the suction and the maneuverability of this vacuum ...
customer_reviews.text: We are pleased with the suction and the maneuverability of this vacuum cleaner. We are disappointed that it does not have some kind of lights on the front to spotlight the area being cleaned. We like the long electric cord, but there should be a more efficient way to store the cord on the vacuum. This product feels very "cheap quality plastic." If we had overs, we would definitely check out the comparable Shark vacuum which is less expensive and equal or better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Not nearly as good as the Dyson I bought 9 years ago that ...
customer_reviews.text: Not nearly as good as the Dyson I bought 9 years ago that just broke. I can tell this one will not last me 9 years.
customer_reviews.author: YA book junkie

customer_reviews.title: I love my dyson DC 65
customer_reviews.text: I love my dyson DC 65, it definitely does the job. Only problem is I over bought. I got the biggest one thinking it was the best but it is too bulky and heavy for my 3 story home and I don't have that much rug area to carry it around. In hind site I should have bought a smaller model.
customer_reviews.author: Liz L

customer_reviews.title: Best Vacuum!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the Dyson 65 multi floor upright vacuum cleaner! It is the best vacuum. This machine sucks up the dirt & dust so quickly.
customer_reviews.author: cruisegirl60

customer_reviews.title: But I am already in love with it
customer_reviews.text: On a friend's recommendation I bought dyson... I am a new user though. But I am already in love with it. Yes it is the best!!!
customer_reviews.author: Vista Leo

customer_reviews.title: Good. Seemed a bit weak in construction towards the ...
customer_reviews.text: Good. Seemed a bit weak in construction towards the top. But good vacuum overall.
customer_reviews.author: So Cal Dad

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT!!! Bought this one after my original Dyson just about died after 13 yrs of frequent use. I see vacuum lines on my carpets again; have not seen that in several years. This machine almost vacuums by itself. No drawbacks, no regrets!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: besides the corners it work great! but should I hand pick or wipe off corners???
customer_reviews.author: Toni Dorris

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Although the directions are poorly written
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Although the directions are poorly written.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Powerful to a fault.  Heavy.
customer_reviews.text: Works great but it is a lot heavier than I imagined. Also suction is so powerful that it is hard to push through thicker carpet.
customer_reviews.author: jim mikkola

customer_reviews.title: It's so easy to handle and worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: It Will find dirt you never knew was there. It's so easy to handle and worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas J

customer_reviews.title: Great suction and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Truly great suction! I like the pivoting head. And very easy to push compared to my 38-year old bicentennial Kirby that continues to be a work horse but recently broke belt. Also compared to Dyson DC 26(?) I bought for my moms house a few years ago. Haven't had this long but I believe I am going to be extremely happy with this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Lou Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum cleaner.!
customer_reviews.text: Does all that it promises... My husband even "enjoyed" using it...
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Steele

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful. So easy to maneuver
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful. So easy to maneuver. I love this machine. The instructions could be clearer but overall this is the best vacuum yet.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia M. Rein

customer_reviews.title: She loves it. Uses it every or every other ...
customer_reviews.text: She loves it. Uses it every or every other day.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff S.

customer_reviews.title: Great for hardwood floors
customer_reviews.text: Great for hardwood floors, but not very good for carpets. I have low-pile carpets and I did use the button for the carpet feature. Cheaper vacuums that I had before did a better job on carpets.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Buy AMazon and save on gas and stress
customer_reviews.text: Like I posted on an earlier product from AMAZON better deal and little tax and prime ship is thee only way to buy now a days
customer_reviews.author: M c L

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a very expensive vacuum but it is worth every cent
customer_reviews.author: Ron matyjasik

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the sweeper..Did not like how long it took to receive it ...
customer_reviews.author: Michael Muschitz

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Vaccum
customer_reviews.text: Amazing piece of equipment! A little heavy but for the performance...worth it.
customer_reviews.author: pittsburg grandma

customer_reviews.title: I am not super impressed with this vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I am not super impressed with this vacuum. It is very clunky and hard to use. It also sits so close to the floor, that it won't pick up items like a coffee bean, or a piece of dog food. I am constantly having to use the hose and I find it cumbersome and time consuming. I had a Shark before this cleaner and it was about $300 cheaper and did a better job.
customer_reviews.author: kristi.fowler

customer_reviews.title: Good vaccum, does a great job & easy to ...
customer_reviews.text: Good vaccum , does a great job & easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: CD

customer_reviews.title: I read all the reviews on how great it is
customer_reviews.text: Big mistake buying this. I read all the reviews on how great it is. But my oreck does a better job. I have a dog and it's horrible on getting the dog hair out of the area rugs. I hate the hose. I hate how you have to drag the whole vacuum around with it and 1/2 the time it falls over. The hose is very stiff. I am going to try and return this and go back to my oreck
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: DYSON FOR THE WIN!
customer_reviews.text: by far the best vacuum I have ever used, bought. I love the power behind the vacuum. It just about sucks up everything around it. This vacuum is magical. EVERYONE NEEDS A DYSON!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ee Bboon eE

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best vacuum I've ever had! I HATE vacuuming and this makes me hate it less.
customer_reviews.author: A. Nace

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love my Dyson. Great buy. Will never buy any other brand. Why did I not do this years ago?
customer_reviews.author: Jacklyn A Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Great vac wish I had had it years ago
customer_reviews.text: Great vac wish I had had it years ago !!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lou Carter

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this vacuum. It is so powerful it virtually pulls itself!!!!! . Glad I finally let go of pinching pennies and made this investment!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I think it works better than the old
customer_reviews.text: I really don't know ,my maid uses it and she does not speak English.I think it works better than the old one
customer_reviews.author: Jim Brown

customer_reviews.title: but it is pretty good at cleaning rugs and floors
customer_reviews.text: This is our 4th Dyson. It is a vacuum cleaner. It will not solve all the problems of the world, but it is pretty good at cleaning rugs and floors. We have 2 cats and one Saint Bernard and live way out at the end of a dirt road in the mountains of WV .... so we occasionally have fur and dirt on our floors and rugs. This machine does an admirable job on hard floors and rugs, and is probably the most efficient of the Dysons we have owned thus far. It has good suction and is fun to chase the cats with.
customer_reviews.author: Farmer Jud

customer_reviews.title: Heavey and Cumbersome
customer_reviews.text: My issue with the Dyson is that it is very heavy and hard to maneuver around furniture. The rotating "ball" is hard to control. When I pull the vacuum back towards me the ball rotates all over the place, so have to adjust it constantly to keep it on a straight path. It does have a lot of suction. I find the handle/for using the hand tools stiff and again, hard to maneuver when try to vacuum dust off tables etc.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: there are things I love and things I absolutely hate (this is my third)
customer_reviews.text: As usual with the Dysons I've owned, there are things I love and things I absolutely hate (this is my third). The good is that the suction on this is amazing...I really feel like it's getting my carpets cleaned. The bad is that I feel it's awkward to use...I'm still getting used to turning it around corners. It's just kind of clumsy and bulky. The other thing I hate is when I put it away it's really difficult to get the handle to snap in the upright position. I always struggle with it.
customer_reviews.author: T. Lawrie

customer_reviews.title: Another amazing product from Dyson.  Best vacuum we have used!
customer_reviews.text: This is our 3rd Dyson (1 for home, 2 for carpeted fitness studio) and these vacuums keep getting better and better! You simply cannot find a better vacuum in terms of ease of use, durability, suction and quality. For our home we have a Dyson Animal that has maintained suction and performance through 3 years of use and 2 Labrador retrievers. Our new DC65 outperforms the other models we have with regards to suction and the wide base makes cleaning our fitness studio (carpet and flooring) faster than ever!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen G

customer_reviews.title: Thoroughly got the job done!
customer_reviews.text: I had tried a less expensive upright; after vacuuming I smelled dust. Then I tried a more expensive canister vacuum; the brush stopped as it began to catch a very thin grocery store bag. The bag is fine, the brush is not; I cannot get it to turn on, after vacuuming 1/2 of bedroom carpet. Then I tried a Dyson DC65 Multi Floor Upright Vacuum Cleaner. I like seeing the dust / animal hairs pulled out of carpet / off of floor. It did a great job; I emptied it 3 times. I found it easy to use (floor, crevices, chair cushions, stairs) and not too heavy. Very pleased; great results; no dust smell.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Merrill

customer_reviews.title: The succession power of DC65 is amazing. First time I vacuumed the whole house and ...
customer_reviews.text: The succession power of DC65 is amazing. First time I vacuumed the whole house and it picked up so much carpet fibers and dust that my old vacuum cleaner could never pick up. It maneuvers well and gets underneath of kitchen cabinets reset. Emptying the canister is one click and it mounts back on the vacuum cleaner easily. A little noisy making a whistling sound but not a deterrent to its excellent capability. Buy it today.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: why did I wait so long to buy this thing?
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. Expensive? Yes. Worth it? Absolutely! I thought I had a good vacuum. Then it died and I bought this, largely because I became tired of pushing around a heavy vacuum. First time I used the Dyson the container filled up after just one room. Yes,there was so much my old vacuum left behind. Everything about this is intelligently designed, from the attachments to the ball that turns on a dime. You won't be disappointed..
customer_reviews.author: Troy In Oregon

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: GREAT PRODUCT!! I had a dyson animal prior to this purchase. Have loved it and had for over 12 years. I leave the older one in the basement and this one for the first and second floors as it is lighter. Even my 12 year old vacuum still has the same suctioning power it had the first time I used it. I would not purchase any other product but dyson. LOVE IT! Would not have it any other way.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: no that good
customer_reviews.text: This is nowhere near the quality I expected knowing the original ball vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: sHoCkErRoCkEt

customer_reviews.title: Our third dyson
customer_reviews.text: I love the dyson vacuum, this one is not my favorite. I like the older style and not the ball. I find it difficult to manuver and the silly handle does not stay upright when you use the wand, what a pain. I would not buy this one again.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Norman

customer_reviews.title: Best Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I use this practically every day. This was purchased as an upgrade to my DC25 and it was well worth it. The suction has increased and it holds significantly more debris. My only complaint would be the wand; I prefer the way it was on the 25 vs this but that's just my personal preference.
customer_reviews.author: A. Housley

customer_reviews.title: Amazing suction!
customer_reviews.text: So far my wife loves this thing. Didn't need the directions it was so easy to take out of the box and follow the little picture to attach the attachments. We have another vacuum which we thought was getting all the dirt up and when we tried this one you should have seen how much this one picked up! Amazing power and easy to roll around!
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Easy and works really well
customer_reviews.text: Works on my big Chinese rugs and transitions to my wood floors with ease! I have dogs and all pet hair is picked up too. I'm still amazed at how well this vacuum works. I do have a big vacuum but it takes so much effort to get out and do my floors....I wanted something that I could pull out QUICK . This vacuum does that.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Mason

customer_reviews.title: Im ok with it
customer_reviews.text: Im ok with this purchase. It doesnt seem top have the suction the commercials claim but a much better machine than what I had. Easy to move around. As with all vacuum cleaners the cords always in the way. I do not like the hose attachment. Not easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: dave higday

customer_reviews.title: Very High Suction
customer_reviews.text: They claim this vacuum cleaner has twice the suction compared to their competitors. I believe that to be true. The DC65 is well built. I would have a hard time believing any other vacuum cleaner could outperform the DC65. The only minor issue is that it might have too much suction when using the Tangle Free Turbine attachment. The attachment uses airflow to rotate the two brushes. The restriction causes the expandable hose to pull back making it a little difficult to vacuum stairs. Using this upright vacuum cleaner is easier for me (back problems) than our old canister cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: wowwowwee

customer_reviews.title: excellent power
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 3 weeks ago. The first thing I did was vacuum the rug that had just been vacuumed by my DC28. Holy Mackerel! It picked up so much stuff left behind! It was easy to assemble, too...just 3 "snaps" and it was ready to use. Also easy to go from rug to hardwood; just a quick press of a button on the handle.
customer_reviews.author: GM

customer_reviews.title: Love it, can be difficult to push
customer_reviews.text: Love this vacuum! Great suction, upright storage, easy to empty out. The only thing I didn't like was that it is heavy and uses quite a bit of muscle to push and carry. I have a weak wrist and after a while it gets too much to maneuver and push around the dyson. Other than that, I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Ricky

customer_reviews.title: Our other vacuums have not performed like this one
customer_reviews.text: Defintely worth the price. Wife got this yesterday and instantly tried it on the carpet and was shocked with how much actually hides in the carpet. Our other vacuums have not performed like this one. She also says the transition from our rug to the hardwood floor was smooth and not even noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: expensive but worth it
customer_reviews.text: im not a clean freak. but when i do clean, i really want to clean. this thing cleans great! it does seem expensive but i read the reviews online and the cost seems to be the same since i have to buy new vacuum cleaners every so often
customer_reviews.author: paul

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful vacuum for hard wood and carpet
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful vacuum for hard wood and carpet! Wand reaches very far and also has a very powerful suction. Only small downfall of this model is that you have to wind up the cord in the back.
customer_reviews.author: N and S

customer_reviews.title: So in love with my new vacuum
customer_reviews.text: So in love with my new vacuum! This thing goes above and beyond what it claims. It really goes deep and cleans out all the nastiness you can't even imagine was there! Worth every penny :)
customer_reviews.author: Monica Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Sucks!
customer_reviews.text: It does a really good job of getting dirt off the floor. Really powerful suction. The only thing I dont like is the hose. It is stored in the handle and is pretty awkward to use.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Stickrod

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy as a rock.  Our old Dyson lasted 10 years and still works!
customer_reviews.text: These vacuums hold up for years. Our last Dyson was the original, and it still works (bought 10 years ago). We moved into a new home and upgraded, and this didn't disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Amazing planet

customer_reviews.title: Very Bad Purchase, very low suction power.
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for about 10 months now, it worked good for about 3 months then it lost the suction power. Also it clogs very badly with small items like cereals, rice etc on the bottom suction inlet pipe. It never picks up small items not even in the carpets. I liked the $75 Bissell Vacuum Cleaner better than this. Waste of money on this purchase, I am posting some pictures on the clogs. I don't recommend this to a friend, I will stay away from Dyson products in the future. Since I don't have 0 star, I have provided 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: User

customer_reviews.title: Love it, just wish I didn't have to completely ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it, just wish I didn't have to completely unwind the cord to pull out the extension. also, the tube is tight and difficult to get into angles.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Gunther

customer_reviews.title: This vacuum works perfect for low carpet but NOT on plush
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum works perfect for low carpet but NOT on plush. I then purchased the DC65 Complete, and it's the same way. I'll keep cheering for the DC14!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Lynn Woods

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I always wanted one and there was no regret. Easy to assemble. When you vacuum the floor, it so eay to navigate the it.
customer_reviews.author: Anarchi-Angel

product_meta.title: Dyson DC65 Multi Floor Upright Vacuum Cleaner
product_meta.description: The DC65 Animal Complete has been built to achieve the highest suction at the cleaner head, twice the suction as any other vacuum. With its self–adjusting cleaner head and re–engineered brushbar, bristles dig deeper into carpets to remove more dust and dirt, while providing superior performance on hard floors. The DC65 has remodeled cyclones and uses the latest Ball technology. It comes with the Tangle–free turbine tool to remove hair from carpets and has extra tools engineered for pet hair and ground–in dirt.
feature_bullets: 5 year parts & labor warranty when purchased from an authorized reseller
Reconfigured brush bar- 25% more power drives bristles deeper into carpets, removing more dirt
Self-adjusting cleaner head- Seals in the suction across carpets and hard floors
Ball technology- For easy steering into difficult places

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars316 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
